trivia: The 'agent z' YouTube channel was originally created to test GMOD animations for a separate channel. Focus shifted when 'How Nintendo Expects You to Listen to Music' gained a significant amount of views.
agent z only uses Garry's Mod. This includes all renders, videos, and thumbnails.
Agent Z mains the Sploosh-O-Matic and plays it almost exclusively, having over 3000 wins on the weapon alone.
agent z’s YouTube profile picture used to change to reflect the team they chose for Splatfest.
Originally, agent z was a Minecraft YouTube channel under the alias 'azMC', having videos totalling as high as 50k views. All videos have since been privated.
'Agent X Tries YOUR Weapons' was inspired by agent z’s own struggle to give the Agent X character her own main.
Promotional characters from throughout the Splatoon series are used as background characters and are simply named 'Inkling' or 'Octoling'.
